column1: I don’t understand why they even need to mention that she died. It’s like they’re trying to make us believe that the coronavirus is deadly when it’s obviously other contributing factors trying to frame the poor thing.
im not saying i want the coronavirus to spread in ny but if it does i look really good in a face mask
damn someone in my c*ty actually has a strain of coronavirus thats tough
